abilities.name: Grand Master of the Deathwing
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, if a Critical Hit is scored, that attack has the **[PRECISION]** ability.

abilities.name: Strikes of Retribution
abilities.rule: Each time a melee attack is allocated to this model, after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, roll one D6 (to a maximum of six D6 per attacking unit): for each 4+, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
